block_comment: This block of code in Verilog generates a Pseudorandom Binary Sequence (PRBS) pattern based on specific input conditions. The module `data_prbs_gen` accepts clock, reset, and seed inputs, and generates a PRBS output, 'prbs_data'. Clock enable signal `data_clk_en` is generated based on readiness states of FIFO, data and condition of `user_burst_cnt` greater than 1. Note that only if `DATA_PATTERN` matches "DGEN_PRBS" or "DGEN_ALL", this generate block will be used, enabling flexible configuration for different data patterns.
